Article.Title: Notification obligation regarding rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing
Article.Description: The controller shall communicate any rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing carried out in accordance with Article 16, Article 17(1) and Article 18.

Obligations.Description: Communicate rectification, erasure, or restriction of processing to each recipient of personal data.
Inform the data subject about those recipients if requested.
